item.title: A Shitass Life
item.description:
Murder Crew

ICE? BORTAC?, The Government murders Alex Pretti, from behind, while he is on hands and knees.

UPDATE: The Runt got moved, because he lies like a goddamned rug. Too bad he’ll likely get to keep pension and get qualified immunity for attempted cover up of Pretti’s murder.

We all knew Bovino is a real, cee u next tuesday, sort.

What’s lying to cover murder up, for The Runt?

item.title: About This Site
item.description:
Surrounded by Shitasses

The wife over here, her grandma (who was married to a veteran of Okinawa, a Deadeye of the 96th) had a term for the likes of which, would bring, instant and likely intense displeasure to her mind. A Shitass, quite plainly.

item.title: Sacrifice
item.description:
Those Who Came Before Me

“It’s a free country, if you have money.” Is what my grandfather told me once.

Heh, didn’t stick in like it should. I have a mouth though, and can flap the shit outta my gums. I can’t really write all to well, but ability hasn’t stopped me yet.

My grandfather served in the USNR during WW2. He (and a whole buncha other coxwains) landed troops in N. Africa, 8 November 1942. Once the landing were done, the ship he was on (USS John Penn), headed to Norfolk, VA. By 17 Dec, 1942, they were headed to the Canal Zone and onto New Caledonia in the Pacific Theatre. The ship sailed in hotly contested waters until August 1943. She arrived at Guadalcanal and anchored at Lunga Roads.

item.title: Shitasses Serving Shit Sandwiches
item.description:
Governmental Breakdown

What has transpired since Agent Orange took office for a second time, is pretty phenominal. Not in a good way for the rank and file here in the U.S. More of a, societal upheaval as the rich get on with betraying the nation that allowed them to amass the fortunes they’ve aquired and stashed.

item.title: Shitass of the Week
item.description:
The Shitass Parade

Week of Jan 25th - 31st:

ICE Barbie Noem. Queen of the MAGA Prom.

K. Noem is seemingly, a horrid person.

She is now a known blatant liar, on air, easy peasy to catch her vile act; Noem, Lying to the Nation about Alex Pretti being some kind of “terrorist”. Does she hide behind trying to scare people? Oh yeah. Does she know absolutely nothing about the laws she is supposed to be dealing with? Hmmmmmm. If one listens to Noem attempting to answer serious questions, for any length of time, it’s apparant she’s lacking any serious study into the topics she tries to stumble through.

item.title: WTF Over?
item.description:
The Internet, has not Been Your Friend.

But here we are. Take a look around, it appears sorta sketchy and not friendly right now. The disinformation onion that is the Internet, has fucked the United States up, flatter than a hammered cock. How useful is a hammered cock people?

Why is it we always want to believe the worst about one another, without really looking at ourselves?

I’m left with assumptions, can’t answer the above other than to hazard, we forget to act and think from a place of love. The universe for humans, is governed by fear and love. We have to choose daily, how we are going to approach the world.
